casebody.data:
CLAFLIN, Appellant, v. NEW YORK STANDARD WATCH CO., Respondent. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. May 17, 1894.) Action by John Claflin and others against the New York Standard Watch Company.

Argued before BOOKSTAVER, BISCHOFF, and PRYOR, JJ.

Chas. W. Gould, for appellant. John W. Weed, for respondent.

No opinion. Motion for leave to appeal to the court of appeals denied, with $10 costs. See 23 N. Y. Supp. 324; 28 N. Y. Supp. 42.
